overview:
Jesse picked up his first camera at age 6 because he wanted to understand and capture the world. A lifelong entrepreneur who has never had a â€œreal jobâ€, Jesse has worked on Oscar nominated documentaries, New Yorkâ€™s Fashion Week, undercover journalism, Internet startups and multiple projects in the art world.

Jesse loves collaboration and has a keen sense of talent and keeps an eye toward new technology. Heâ€™s motivated mostly by a sense of adventure and a desire to expose the world to new art, web products, and marketing strategies.

Jesse has had many hits ranging from working on the biggest shows in NY Fashion week to a documentary film adventure that turned into an Academy Award nomination and now as CEO of OHM Creative Group, a web Marketing Agency, and started what Real Detroit calls the Best Art Gallery in Michigan and co-founded art darling and overnight success, 1xRUN.com.
